case_title: Messrs DADA STEEL MILLS vs METALEXPORT and 5 others
issues: Whether defendant/respondent committed breach of agreement dated 24-10-1972
What amount of compensation, if any

facts.letter_of_credit: Irrevocable letter of credit opened by appellant
facts.delivery_issue: Respondents refused to deliver vessel citing non-compliance with clause 16 of agreement

legal_provisions.contract_act_section_73: Compensation for loss or damage caused by breach of contract
legal_provisions.specific_relief_act_section_19: Power to award compensation in certain cases

contentions: Appellant entitled to compensation under section 19 of Specific Relief Act
Appellant purchased vessel for re-rolling factory use, not for selling scrap

precedents_cited: Sm. Shakuntla Devi v. Harish Chandra AIR 1952 Allahabad 620
Ganga Singh v. Santosh Kumar AIR 1963 Allahabad 201
Muhammad Sharif v. National Motors Ltd. 1989 CLC 916
Messrs Nigar Pictures v. Messrs United Brothers PLD 1970 Karachi 770

key_findings.appellant_entitlement: Appellant entitled to specific performance and compensation
key_findings.use_of_vessel: Appellant intended to use vessel scrap for re-rolling factory
